import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-details', standalone: false, templateUrl: './user-details.html', styleUrl: './user-details.scss' }) export class UserDetails { @Input() user!: { userName: string; email: string; profilePic: string }; }
